entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT, Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hopedale 07:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High minus 2. Forecast issued 08:03 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 08:03 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Forecast issued 08:03 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
